SELECT city_name, storeno, store_name, sum(new_10_count) new_10_count, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)) as year , MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)) as month , NOW() as createtime FROM ( SELECT tatob.city_name, tatob.storeno, tatob.store_name, tatob.area_no, tatob.area_name, tatob.employee_a_no, tatob.employee_a_name, ifnull(bb.num,0) new_10_count FROM (SELECT DISTINCT city_name,storeno,store_name,area_no,name as area_name,employee_a_no,employee_a_name FROM tmp_area_to_order_block where employee_a_no is not null) tatob LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t_store_custom.area_no, t_store_custom.area_name, t_store_custom.employee_a_no, t_store_custom.employee_a_name, t_store_custom.storeno, count(t_store_custom.customer_id) num FROM ( SELECT t_m1.store_id, t_m1.customer_id, t_m1.tiny_village_name, t_m1.area_no, t_m1.area_name AS area_name, t_m1.order_placename, t_m1.employee_a_no, t_m1.employee_a_name, t_m1.storeno FROM ( SELECT tor.store_id, tor.customer_id, tor.trading_price, tatob.tiny_village_name, tatob.area_no, tatob.name AS area_name, tatob.order_placename, tatob.employee_a_no, tatob.employee_a_name, tatob.storeno FROM t_eshop te JOIN t_order tor ON (te.id=tor.eshop_id) JOIN df_order_flow tof ON (tor.id=tof.order_id AND tof.order_status='signed' AND tof.create_time>=DATE(#{begindate}) AND tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)) JOIN t_order_address taddr ON (taddr.id = tor.order_address_id) JOIN tmp_area_to_order_block tatob ON (tatob.order_placename = taddr.placename AND tatob.platformid = tor.store_id AND tatob.employee_a_no IS NOT NULL AND tatob.order_placename IS NOT NULL) WHERE te.`name` NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND te.white!='QA' GROUP BY tor.store_id,tor.customer_id HAVING SUM(tor.trading_price)>10.0 ) t_m1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tor_in.store_id, tor_in.customer_id, tatob.tiny_village_name, tatob.area_no, tatob.name AS area_name, tatob.order_placename, tatob.employee_a_no, tatob.employee_a_name, tatob.storeno, SUM(tor_in.trading_price) FROM t_eshop te_in JOIN t_order tor_in ON (te_in.id=tor_in.eshop_id ) JOIN df_order_flow tof_in ON (tor_in.id=tof_in.order_id AND tof_in.order_status='signed' AND tof_in.create_time<DATE(#{begindate})) JOIN t_order_address taddr ON (taddr.id = tor_in.order_address_id) JOIN tmp_area_to_order_block tatob ON (tatob.order_placename = taddr.placename AND tatob.platformid = tor_in.store_id AND tatob.employee_a_no IS NOT NULL AND tatob.order_placename IS NOT NULL) WHERE te_in.`name` NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND te_in.white!='QA' GROUP BY tor_in.store_id,tor_in.customer_id ) t_old ON (t_m1.store_id=t_old.store_id AND t_m1.customer_id=t_old.customer_id) WHERE t_old.store_id IS NULL ) t_store_custom GROUP BY t_store_custom.area_no ) bb ON (bb.area_no = tatob.area_no) ) areanewstore
storeno in (${storeids})
GROUP BY storeno
